query:
SELECT u.id as oderId, u.name, u.email, u.role, g.id as gestorId, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gestor_lojas gl WHERE gl.gestorId = g.id) as numLojas
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Fábio%' OR u.name LIKE '%Fabio%';
